Articles.Content:
A set of photos of my art. Medium is graphite pencil on paper, with occasional colored pencil.

Corrected images of said art will follow, in a truer-to-life form. As it is, they were photographed on a curved page, so they're distorted oddly.

Javascript is disabled. View full album
That second pic got me. Very nice!
Rep! It reminds me of what I used to draw in my spare times at school. Though colored... and more complete...
